summary: Defines an abstract base class that integrates with the HuggingFace Diffusers loading pipeline to transform diffusion models into a quantized form. It handles configuration merging, selective exclusion of model components, data type and memory adjustments, validation of the quantized model, and any required post‑processing to enable efficient inference.
business_intent: Provide a reusable framework for quantizing diffusion models, reducing computational and memory costs during inference while maintaining model quality, thereby facilitating faster and more scalable deployment of generative AI applications.
